thread.title: Decent hotel at a decent price, and surprisingly good view
thread.title_full: Decent hotel at a decent price, and surprisingly good view - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/Manhattan-Chelsea, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: TravelingBbusFun
title: Decent hotel at a decent price, and surprisingly good view
text: I chose this property because it was one of the least expensive hotels in the Chelsea area. It is still Manhattan, so that means it is still expensive, but not bad for a decent hotel. I had a double room, and there was barely any room to walk around the room. Again, standard for the area, but not for typical Garden Inns. Otherwise, the room was fine, although it didnt have a premium movie channel on TV. I had a room on the 24th floor facing south, so I did have a great view of the Freedom Tower and lower Manhattan, which was not expected.
